text: @dclarke1984 @Niall_Boylan I understand that the wifi is slower at the moment and if everything goes back to normal, it will return to normal. The 4G on my network hasn't really changed.. I also don't believe that 5G is Covid. It is just coincidental that this is happening at the same time.
